original_text: Priests must not marry a widow, or a woman whose husband has sent her away. They may only marry Israelite women who have never had sex. Or they may marry a widow whose husband had been a priest.
korean_text: 과부나 이혼한 여인에게 장가 들지 말고 오직 이스라엘 족속의 처녀나 혹시 제사장의 과부에게 장가 들 것이며

sentences.original_text: Priests must not marry a widow
or a woman whose husband has sent her away
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 남편이 버린 여자와도 결혼해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: They may only marry Israelite women
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오직 이스라엘 여성들만 결혼할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Or they may marry a widow
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그들은 과부와 결혼할 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: whose husband had been a priest
